oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Necrosis and sloughing of skin associated with limb cellulitis in four cows and a calf: predisposing causes, treatment and prognosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nguhiu-Mwangi, J. A.
Mbithi, P. M. F.
Mbiuki, S. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: limb cellulitis
non-suppurative
skin necrosis
metacarpus
metatarsus
sloughing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four cows and a calf with non-suppurative limb cellulitis were observed subsequently to suffer skin necrosis and sloughing in the affected limbs, either on or distal to the metacarpus or metatarsus. Full article published in Veterinary Record(1991) 129, 192-195
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1991; 38
